divs: sighting detailswe saw a strange black rectangular-shaped object as we drove south down i5 around 2 pm sun 4\27. it looked like a hang-glider's canopy but larger. there was not connection present to anything underneath the shape. my wife was able to observe it as we passed under and noted a metallic reflection from the sun and was not a balloon. i observed the object was moving northwest (against prevailing winds as noted by ground winds, flora, etc) and the object was about 800 to 1000 feet in altitude. it seemed to be moving at a speed about equal to the speed of our vehicle, about 80 mph.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in San Juan Capistrano
There were no other sightings in San Juan Capistrano on or around April 27th 2008
Summary: Shaped like a hanglider's parasail-but larger
